tool_description: Creates organized recipe frameworks with ingredient lists, step-by-step instructions, timing, and cooking methods based on provided parameters.

main_ingredients.description: Primary ingredients that define the dish

cooking_methods.description: Primary cooking techniques to be used

servings.description: Number of servings the recipe should yield

skill_level.description: Target skill level: beginner, intermediate, advanced

error_messages: Invalid cooking method: Use recognized methods like saut√©ing, roasting, grilling, steaming, braising, etc.
Servings out of range: Provide servings between 1 and 20.
Invalid skill level: Use one of [beginner, intermediate, advanced].
Time limits too restrictive: Ensure prep and cook time limits are realistic for the chosen cooking methods.
Equipment conflict: Some cooking methods require specific equipment not in your available list.
usage: Provide main ingredients, cooking methods, and servings. Optionally specify supporting ingredients, time limits, skill level, and available equipment. Returns a structured recipe framework ready for refinement.

recipe_title.description: Generated recipe title based on main ingredients and cooking method

difficulty_notes.description: Notes about technique difficulty and tips for success
